name: FUTUREVOXIMAGINARIUMDOTEXE
description:
Explore the future in musical voxels simulation!

Art Ben

Programming Jason

Soundtrack Rich , OST

Voices Old Shrimp Eyes

"Our actions here aren't purposeful, they belong to aimless strolls that pass the time, or as the game's creators put it, "the ennui of penultimate existence." " Kill Screen

"The game seems to lose some focus in the later stages, with hallucinatory elements." Peter Green

"Futurevox itself as a UFO. Hardly do we have the time to understand what we need to do here that the second music track comes together. And so on." Indiemag

"Futurevox Imaginarium look like a video game than a concept album, illustrated interactively. And given the weak competition in the sector, it is certainly one of the best." Oujevipo
